name: Quadric
tag_list: positioning-strategy, culture, value-propositions, b2b, brand, healthcare, marketing
overview:
Quadric is a strategic positioning, brand and marketing consultancy. We help international B2B and healthcare companies increase differentiation and drive growth.

Companies usually hire us at times of significant change such as when developing a new strategy, integrating acquisitions or addressing an increasing competitive threat. We are known for running projects efficiently, working closely with in-house teams and ensuring recommendations get implemented.

Based in Copenhagen, we work with clients in a wide range of countries. Browse our cases to get a sense of our experience (http://quadric.net/cases/).

We welcome inquiries at any stage of your decision process. Please contact Mark Ronan (+45 26 28 90 80) to discuss your situation.
